description: ProcureFlow manages the full procurement lifecycle from requisition through vendor selection, order, receipt, invoice verification and payment. Designed for auditability, date-driven SLAs and integration with master data (items, vendors, GL). The Main Workflow sheet captures sequential procurement stages with planned/actual dates and auto-calculated delays per stage.

sheets.name: ProcureFlow - Main Workflow

columns.name: Reg ID
columns.description: Primary registration identifier for the procurement record (Primary Key).

columns.name: Requisition ID
columns.description: Unique requisition identifier (may be same as Reg ID for initial requests).

columns.name: Current Stage
columns.description: Current workflow stage name for quick filtering and reporting.

columns.name: Owner
columns.description: Person responsible for progressing the record.

columns.name: Expected Project  Delivery End Date
columns.description: Overall expected delivery/completion date for the procurement.

columns.name: Comments  Audit Notes
columns.description: Free text for comments and audit trail notes.

columns.name: Actual1
columns.description: Stage 1 actual completion date (entered by user).

columns.name: Delay1
columns.description: Stage 1 delay in days: =IF(Actual1 IS BLANK, "", Actual1 - Planned1). Positive = late.

columns.name: Requisition Number
columns.description: Generated requisition number referencing the request.

columns.name: Items Summary linked to Item Master
columns.description: Brief items list and quantities; detailed line items in Item Master import.

columns.name: Currency Stage1
columns.description: Currency for estimated value (link to Currency Master).

columns.name: Justification  Comments Stage1
columns.description: Business justification notes for the requisition.

columns.name: Actual2
columns.description: Stage 2 actual completion date (entered by approver).

columns.name: Delay2
columns.description: Stage 2 delay in days: =IF(Actual2 IS BLANK, "", Actual2 - Planned2).

columns.name: Planned3
columns.description: Stage 3 planned date for vendor selection/RFQ.

columns.name: Delay3
columns.description: Stage 3 delay: =IF(Actual3 IS BLANK, "", Actual3 - Planned3).

columns.name: RFQ Issue Date
columns.description: Date RFQ was issued to vendors.

columns.name: Vendors Contacted
columns.description: List of vendor IDs contacted (refer Vendor Master).

columns.name: Selected Vendor ID
columns.description: Vendor chosen for the PO (Vendor Master link).

columns.name: Planned4
columns.description: Stage 4 planned date for PO issuance.

columns.name: Delay4
columns.description: Stage 4 delay: =IF(Actual4 IS BLANK, "", Actual4 - Planned4).

columns.name: Payment Terms Stage4
columns.description: Payment terms defined on the PO.

columns.name: Required Delivery Date PO
columns.description: Required delivery date specified in PO.

columns.name: Planned5
columns.description: Stage 5 planned date for vendor confirmation.

columns.name: Delay5
columns.description: Stage 5 delay: =IF(Actual5 IS BLANK, "", Actual5 - Planned5).

columns.name: Delay6
columns.description: Stage 6 delay: =IF(Actual6 IS BLANK, "", Actual6 - Planned6).

columns.name: Received Quantity Summary
columns.description: Summary of quantities received per line.

columns.name: Receiving Location
columns.description: Warehouse or site where goods were received.

columns.name: Delay7
columns.description: Stage 7 delay: =IF(Actual7 IS BLANK, "", Actual7 - Planned7).

columns.name: Planned8
columns.description: Stage 8 planned date for invoice receipt & verification.

columns.name: Actual8
columns.description: Stage 8 actual invoice verification completion date.

columns.name: Delay8
columns.description: Stage 8 delay: =IF(Actual8 IS BLANK, "", Actual8 - Planned8).

columns.name: Planned9
columns.description: Stage 9 planned date for payment processing.

columns.name: Delay9
columns.description: Stage 9 delay: =IF(Actual9 IS BLANK, "", Actual9 - Planned9).

columns.name: Delay10
columns.description: Stage 10 delay: =IF(Actual10 IS BLANK, "", Actual10 - Planned10).

columns.name: Contract Reference
columns.description: Contract or agreement reference for the procurement.

columns.name: Closure Date
columns.description: Date when the procurement record was formally closed.

columns.name: Archive Location  Link
columns.description: Document storage link or archive location identifier.

columns.name: Close Notes
columns.description: Final notes, lessons learned and retention info.

stages.stage_description: Initiator creates purchase requisition with items, estimates and justification.
Approvers review and approve/route the requisition.
RFQs issued to shortlisted vendors and bids evaluated.
Formal Purchase Order created and issued to vendor.
Vendor acknowledges PO and confirms delivery schedule.
Physical receipt of goods at warehouse/site and GRN creation.
Inspection, acceptance or rejection of received goods and NCR handling.
Invoice received from vendor and matched/verified against PO and GRN.
Payment approval and execution; payment record and reconciliation.
Final contract closure, lessons learned capture and archival of documents.

sheets.description: Primary workflow tracking sheet for all purchase requests and orders. Timestamp is first column. All stages are tracked sequentially with Planned{N}, Actual{N}, Delay{N} (formula) as the first three columns of each stage group.

sheets.name: Login Master
sheets.description: User authentication and authorization. Required for access control and page-level permissions.

sheets.name: Item Master
sheets.description: Catalog of purchasable items and services used for line-item population and lookups.

sheets.name: Vendor Master
sheets.description: Vendor registry for supplier lookup and contact details.

sheets.name: Department Master
sheets.description: List of departments for request routing and allocation.

sheets.name: GL Master
sheets.description: Chart of accounts / GL codes used for cost allocation.

sheets.name: Import Dump - Item Lines
sheets.description: Optional import sheet for bulk uploading item line details per requisition/PO. Used for data import mapping into the Main Workflow Items Summary.
